About Overseas.realty

Italy has long enticed foreign investors looking for a second home — think countryside villas, seafront apartments and quaint townhouses and you will get an idea of just a handful of the properties available on Overseas.realty.com. Take a look at the Unusual Properties page for a unique home, with options including castles, mills and even a church or monastery!

A guide to buying a property in Italy
